allow: Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root soat_reminders -e "ALTER TABLE empresas DISCARD TABLESPACE;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS soat_reminders; CREATE DATABASE soat_reminders CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci; SHOW DATABASES LIKE ''soat_reminders'';")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "CREATE DATABASE soat_reminders CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci; SHOW DATABASES LIKE ''soat_reminders'';")
